This spell can’t be countered.
Flying
Whenever an opponent draws a card, create a Clue token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, Inscrutable Hieromancer gains hexproof until end of turn.

Flying, haste
When Aurelia, Wings of Justice enters the battlefield, return each creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. They gain haste until end of turn.

Flying, trample, haste
Other attacking creatures you control get +2/+0 and have “Whenever this creature deals combat damage, sacrifice it.”

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Target player discards a card. You gain life equal to its mana value.
[-2]: Reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.
[-6]: Exile all opponents’ hands and graveyards. You gain 5 life for each card exiled this way.

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature gains vigilance and “Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.”
Equip {1}

Choose one —
• Destroy target creature if its mana value is greater than the number of cards in its controller’s hand.
• Target creature gets -1/-1 for each card in its controller’s hand.

Exile the top three cards of your library. You may play them this turn. At the beginning of your next end step, if there are any cards exiled with Enter the Carnarium, put them into your graveyard, then you lose that much life.
Each spell you cast that’s red or green costs {1} less to cast.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
{1}{G}{W}, Sacrifice Tend the Gardens: Create a green and white Elemental creature token with “This creature’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.”

When Kaya’s Cunning enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card and you gain 3 life.
Whenever a token you control dies, you may return Kaya’s Cunning to your hand.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{T}: Mill two cards.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards. You gain life equal to the total mana value of the discarded cards.

Flash
When Bounding Krasis enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target creature.

As Lyev Prosecutor enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can’t be activated unless they’re mana abilities.

When Key Performer enters the battlefield, target opponent exiles two cards from their hand. Until your next turn, they may play one of those cards. When they do, you may play the other card until the end of your next turn. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.
{T}: Add {R}{G}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, you may have that creature enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. If you don’t, it gains haste until end of turn.

Vigilance
{T}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, each player loses 1 life.
{W}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.

Trample
Whenever you spend one or more mana to cast a noncreature spell, put that many +1/+1 counters on Erratic Plasmologist.

Whenever Putrid Mass attacks, mill two cards. Put a +1/+1 counter on Putrid Mass for each nonland card milled this way. You gain 1 life for each land card milled this way.
When Putrid Mass dies, you may put any number of cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Choose one —
• Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. They gain indestructible until end of turn.
• Imposing Recruitment deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.
{1}{G}{U}: You may have Emergent Ooze become a 1/1 Ooze creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

{W}{U}, {T}: Tap target nonland permanent.
{2}{W}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.

{U}{B}, {T}: Target creature gains menace until end of turn.
{U}{B}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

{B}{R}, {T}: Target creature can’t block this turn.
{4}{B}{R}, {T}: Target opponent loses 3 life.

{R}{G}, {T}: Add three mana in any combination of colors.
{4}{R}{G}, {T}: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

{G}{W}, {T}: Untap two other target permanents. Activate only once each turn.
{G}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

{W}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{1}{W}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

{U}{R}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{2}{U}{R}, {T}: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

{B}{G}, {T}: Mill three cards.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
{4}{R}{W}, {T}: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

{G}{U}, {T}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{4}{G}{U}, {T}: Bifurcate target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](If it isn’t a token, sacrifice it. If you do, create two tapped tokens that are copies of it except each is a Mutant.)[/i]

Flying, first strike
When Justiciar of Retribution enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target tapped creature.
Evoke {1}{W} [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it’s sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]
Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.”

When Street Swarm Elder enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black and green Plant Zombie creature tokens. If Street Swarm Elder escaped, create two 3/3 black and green Plant Zombie creature tokens instead. 
Escape—{5}{G}{G}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]

• Return another target creature you control to its owner’s hand.

{T}: Create a Treasure token.

{4}{U}: Bifurcate Beguiling Sheepopotamus. [i](If it isn’t a token, sacrifice it. If you do, create two tapped tokens that are copies of it except each is a Mutant.)[/i]
Prevent all damage Dinrova Abductor would deal to players.

Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, Give Chase deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. Create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the amount of excess damage dealt to that creature this way.

When Lingering Spirits enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life.

Warmind [i](Whenever this creature attacks, you may have another target creature gain this creature’s abilities this turn.)[/i]

Choose one or both —
• Creatures you control gain vigilance and indestructible until end of turn.
• You may pay {2}. If you do, after this phase, if it’s your main phase, there is an additional combat phase.

Vigilance
Cards can’t leave graveyards.
Spells and abilities your opponents control can’t cause you to discard cards.
Target player mills half their library, rounded up. You may cast a card from among them without paying its mana cost.

You may have Lazav, Master Shapeshifter enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is Lazav, Master Shapeshifter, it’s legendary in addition to its other types, and it has “Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may have Lazav, Master Shapeshifter become a copy of that creature, except its name is Lazav, Master Shapeshifter, it’s legendary in addition to its other types, and it has this ability.”

Exile target instant or sorcery card with mana value X or less from your graveyard. You may cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost. Repeat this process up to X times.
Exile Mizzix’s Overload.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
[-1]: Target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains catalyze until end of turn. Add {R}.
[-2]: Ral deals 3 damage to any target.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, add that card’s effects to that spell.”

cards.rules_text: Vannifar, Simic Apogee has all activated abilities of all permanents, except they cost {1} more to activate. [i](This includes mana abilities.)[/i]

Whenever a creature dies, exile it.
{3}: Create a token that’s a copy of a card exiled with Processing Vat. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only once each turn.

Flying
When Angelic Satirist enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose two at random — 
• Each player draws a card and loses 2 life.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.
• Each player discards a card.
• Exile each player’s graveyard.

Svogthir, Ever-Growing enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Svogthir.
{X}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Svogthir: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value X.
